ygData.subject: Re: Wish List Part 2
ygData.msgSnippet: I m actually disappointed in lack of argument about my 1st new proposed attack for a fire elemental: suicide.  Here s another attack for the fire elemental:

From: "Daniel Paul Hightower" <dph_of_rules@...>

I'm actually disappointed in lack of argument about my 1st new 
proposed attack for a fire elemental: suicide.  Here's another attack 
for the fire elemental: giant fireball.

One goal of mine is for every character to have at least 3 attacks.

Here's 2 for a slime: Combine.  Only works for 2 small slimes.  When 
they combine, the new experience level is equal to 3/4 of the combined 
experience level.  The other attack for slime would be Digestion.  The 
slime sends out digestive fluids as an attack.

Barbarian - Striking hammer.  The character hits the ground with his 
hammer, all opponents within a certain proximity and a a straight line 
from him get attacked.  The alternate for this one would be the same 
except the attack heads out in all 8 directions.

Ghost - I still like the idea of possession.  I would like to add this 
 twist - If a ghost and a sketelon are on the same team, they can 
combine to form a random character (not ghost or skeleton).  The new 
experience level is 3/4 of the combined.
